title: naturally_ripened_bananas_from_on_farm_harvest
summary: Bananas have ripened naturally after harvest and are ready for consumption.
description: This data unit documents a banana bunch that has reached ripeness through natural post-harvest ripening. The bunch was originally cut on 2026-01-08 and left to ripen without artificial intervention. The current state indicates readiness for consumption and supports on-farm food rotation without external purchase.

external_reference.note: External reference provided for verification only.
